0: I had a great price on this hotel
The helpful female member of staff confirmed availability for the 2 nights and kindly offered me access to the hotels wifi to see if it was possible to reserve a room online for a cheaper price
Nice room we got superior with no extra charge the lobby is old spa area small and older but the room was great as well as the breakfast
I recommend it especially if you don´t wo nt to spend 100 or 150 Euros for a hotel in the center i am sure i am staying here again
Breakfast was good and included in room rate along with free wifi
Comfortable hotel in an excellent location at a very good price
Greal location with good price quality balance
The Hotel offered a Gym and a pool to use free of charge
The facilities were excellent pool gym sauna jacuzi all free to use and breakfast included in price aswel for £ 151 what i paid was a real bargain
Would recommend for everyone perfect location and price
1: The parking open air no protection no services is charged for € 55 a day or 45 per hour counting minutes like hours
The use of pool and gym is not free for paying guests as we were informed by reception and if we wanted to use any facilities for even 30 minutes we had to pay 18 euros per day each
It even allows you to pay in cash
The hill is a steep walk and you have the option of the local tourist bus that will take you to the slavin and the castle for 10 euros
Also note in rooms all the food laid out is not complimentary and you will be charged

Just an average room nothing specialSpa is free of charge for some upper level rooms for the rest it would be 8 eur per person per visitThe pool is quite small jacuzi is nearly always crowdedUnfortunately sauna was broken when we were there but we had a look and it looked really cool hopefully they will renovate sonWifi is no password and quite quickPeople at reception are helpful quick and funny in a good wayThe halls at floors are relatively quietWindows are well isolated i think so
Beware the substandard service but sky high service charges for everything from parking to pool
Did n’t try the swimming pool seems odd that unles superior room you have to pay
pool extra charge but did not see that on the web site
